entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times late this morning and this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
